title: SketchMe.App
description:
In SketchMe.App we have two functions. The AI Profile Picture Generator and the AI Designed T-shirts. 

1) AI Generated Profile Pictures. Using just a few selfies, our Generative AI instantly creates unique illustrations for your social media Profile Picture. 

2) AI Designed T-shirts for Pet Lovers and Family Lovers. Get your personalized T-shirts designed by AI in seconds, from pictures of your beloved ones.
